meanings.definition: A haircut in which the hair is clipped very short all over.
meanings.sent1: He got a buzzcut before summer to stay cool.
meanings.sent2: The barber gave him a buzzcut for a low-maintenance look.
meanings.sent3: The little boy giggled as he saw his buzzcut in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her buzzcut was like a field of freshly mown grass.
meanings.sent5: The buzzcut made him feel light and free.

meanings.definition: To cut the hair very short all over.
meanings.sent1: She decided to buzzcut her hair for a change.
meanings.sent2: The stylist buzzcut his hair quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent3: He buzzcut his hair before the big race to feel aerodynamic.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the clippers buzzcutting the hair filled the salon.
meanings.sent5: Buzzcutting her hair was a bold move that paid off.
